title: 86/176/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 April 1986 approving an addendum to the programme relating to the processing and marketing of flax in France pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 April 1986
approving an addendum to the programme relating to the processing and marketing of flax in France pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the French text is authentic)
(86/176/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The addendum to the programme relating to the processing and marketing of flax forwarded by the French Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 18 June 1985 is hereby approved, with the exception of the part relating to the by-products referred to therein.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1981, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 380, 31. 12. 1980, p. 7.
